Net Income: consolidated income net of tax excluding portion attributable to noncontrolling interest
consolidated income net of tax excluding portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest

Total Other Comprehensive Income: other comprehensive income loss net of tax

Stock Repurchases: stock repurchased and retired during period value
__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
